Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~sstone1 didn't we update the ports on purpose? did we miss something?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: Yeah ... looks like the wrong port slipped in

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Found it... wrong port slipped in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/fabric/+/30483/ ~joe-alewine , this was after the (correct) port changes were made in FAB-14509

Action.author: joe-alewine
Action.body: Yup, this was on me. The port changes happened in a PR I wasn't aware of that was merged quickly while I had a PR in the works about BYFN at the same time. I tried to find and fix all of the port changes but must have missed this one.

Action.author: joe-alewine
Action.body: This error does not appear in the master branch, so the change only needs to be pushed against release-1.4.
